TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MatrixTransform3D extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D
Public NotInheritable Class MatrixTransform3D Inherits Transform3D

Docs.summary: Creates a transformation specified by a , used to manipulate objects or coordinate systems in 3-D world space.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> clase para crear transformaciones personalizadas no proporcionadas por el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D> clase.
Puede combinar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> objetos mediante el uso de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup> clase.

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , and makes deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Este método se usa para producir copias modificables de inmovilizado <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos o de cualquier <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto. Para mayor comodidad, este método prevalece sobre la versión heredada con una implementación fuertemente tipada.
Para obtener más información, consulta <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, and makes deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

public: virtual property System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Matrix3D Value { System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Matrix3D get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a matrix representation of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] transformation.
Docs.value: Un representación de la [! Transformación de include[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3D-MD.MD)].

remarks.format:
## Remarks El <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A> propiedad se hereda de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> clase. El <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A> propiedad le permite convertir cualquier <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> objeto en un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> objeto. Dado que el <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform> clase se define mediante un Matrix3D, el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A> propiedades siempre devuelven el mismo valor. La clase MatrixTransform3D expone el <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A> propiedad para habilitar el acceso de escritura.
